name: 蕭俊祥
objective: 介紹影像處理、智慧機器人等理論與技術，使學員瞭解程式語言於機器人自動化的應用, 及評估如何使用適當的演算法。
schedule:
Week 1:  Introduction to LabVIEW
Week 2-3:  LabVIEW programming
Week 4-7: Vision system and digital image processing
Week 8:  Introduction to Lego robot
Week 9: Midterm Exam
Week 10-13: Intelligen robot experiments (I)(II)(III)(VI)
Week 14-16: Intelligen robot experiment (V)(VI)(VII)
Week 17-18: Final Exams
